Class MainStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MainStructure
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This class constructs the total house map with rooms and buttons.
    Author:
    Rahmi
